game.name: PhotoWorld
game.shortDescription: PhotoWorld is a calm travel game, the essence of which is to take beautiful photos.
game.shortDescriptionEn: PhotoWorld is a calm travel game, the essence of which is to take beautiful photos.

reviewHighlights.text: PhotoWorld is another asset/template flip from serial copy + paste "developers", Piece of Voxel, who do nothing but rip off the work of others, change...
[h1]Good but bad: 4/10[/h1] The game is very pretty and is fairly interesting -- IF it was a minigame inside of something full fledged. It hasn't been...
